mapper.sql: ID, OPTIMISTIC, MODULE_CODE, VALIDATE, USEABLE, NAME, CODE, ORDERS, URL, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into sys_function (ID, OPTIMISTIC, MODULE_CODE, VALIDATE, USEABLE, NAME, CODE, ORDERS, URL, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{optimistic,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orders,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
update sys_function
OPTIMISTIC = #{optimistic,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODULE_CODE = #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALIDATE = #{validate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USEABLE = #{useable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERS = #{orders,jdbcType=INTEGER},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_function set OPTIMISTIC = #{optimistic,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MODULE_CODE = #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALIDATE = #{validate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USEABLE = #{useable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERS = #{orders,jdbcType=INTEGER}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
